name: Celloops
description:
A single 8-bar, layered cello loop that changes as you move around.

Made with Unity and Wwise. Music recorded in REAPER.
Free Low Poly Chess Set by Andrew McClain Hanold.

If you alt-tab in and out of the game, it confuses the cellos. Think of this not as a bug by an inexperienced developer, but as an unique and clever feature.
